response.overview: "Jethro: In The Madhouse" is a comedy special that showcases the humorous talents of the renowned British comedian, Jethro. In this uproarious performance, Jethro takes the audience on a delightful journey through his world of comedic storytelling.  The special features Jethro's distinctive blend of rural humor and observational wit, offering a unique perspective on everyday life and the quirks of modern society. With his down-to-earth style and affable charm, Jethro spins humorous tales that resonate with audiences of all backgrounds.
response.title: Jethro: In The Madhouse
